type: Tutorial Step - What Else Is Cooking?

definition.text: Superalgos is turning into a multi-project platform, and Ethereum is the first project being integrated...

paragraphs.text: What does integrating Ethereum mean, you ask? It means that—in future versions—you will be able to:
Connect to an Ethereum node right from within Superalgos using the visual interface.

Mine blockchain data to access coin and contract information for all Ethereum-based projects, including De-Fi or what have you, visualizing data on the charts, building indicators, and leveraging the rest of the Superalgos infrastructure.
Use the data to trade by consuming related indicators from within trading systems!
